569980.name: Fantasy Grounds - Rippers Resurrected: Frightful Expeditions (Savage Worlds)
569980.description:
Take your Rippers on adventures around the world, into the far corners of the Empire, exotic locales beyond, and the shadowy corners best left forgotten!

Frightful Expeditions features more info on all seven continents, and new creatures and Savage Tales to go with them!
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset as well as a one time purchase of the Rippers Resurrected Players Guide and Rippers Resurrected Game Masters Handbook (GM only).
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
